name: Pearl Izumi Amfib Tights - Women's
description: Work up a sweat when the mercury drops. Weather-resistant panels in high-exposure areas and warm thermal fleece keep your leg muscles warm in cold temps. No chamois lets you wear them over your favourite shorts or by themselves for other cold-weather activities.Wind- and water- resistant AmFIB soft shell in key exposure areas.Moisture shedding PI Dry Thermal Fleece in areas of less exposure is warm and breathable.DWR treatment is applied to individual fibers, not the surface of the garment.Wide elastic waistband for support and comfort.Silicone grippers keep hems in place.BioViz® reflective elements for low light visibility.
